// <auto-generated/>
using DomainSmith.Entity;
using DomainSmith.Abstraction.Common;
using DomainSmith.Abstraction.Core.Primitives;
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.IO;
using System.Linq;
using System.Net.Http;
using System.Threading;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using System.Text.Json;

namespace TestNamespace;

partial class TestEntity : Entity<Guid>
{
    private TestEntity(Guid id, string name) : base(id)
    {
        Name = name;
    }

    internal static TestEntity? Create(string name)
    {
        bool canCreate = true;
        OnCreatingAuto(ref name, ref canCreate);
        OnCreating(ref name, ref canCreate);
    
        var result = new TestEntity(Guid.NewGuid(), name);
                                 
        OnCreated(result, ref canCreate);
        if(!canCreate) return null;

        result.CreateCreatedAt();

        return result;
    }
    
    internal void Update(string name)
    {
        bool canUpdate = true;
        OnUpdatingAuto(ref name, ref canUpdate);
        OnUpdating(ref name, ref canUpdate);
        
        var tmpName = Name;
        Name = name;
        
        OnUpdated(ref canUpdate);
        if(!canUpdate)
        {
           Name = tmpName;
           return;
        }
        UpdateCreatedAt();
    
        return;
    }

    private static void OnCreatingAuto(ref string name, ref bool canCreate)
    {
        OnCreatingName(ref name, ref canCreate);
    }

    private void OnUpdatingAuto(ref string name, ref bool canUpdate)
    {
        OnUpdatingName(ref name, ref canUpdate);
    }
    
    static partial void OnCreating(ref string name, ref bool canCreate);
    static partial void OnCreated(TestEntity result, ref bool canCreate);

    partial void OnUpdating(ref string name, ref bool canUpdate);
    partial void OnUpdated(ref bool canUpdate);

    partial void CreateCreatedAt();
    partial void UpdateCreatedAt();

    static partial void OnCreatingName(ref string name, ref bool canCreate);
    partial void OnUpdatingName(ref string name, ref bool canUpdate);
}
